name: Hermes
short_description:
This Python 2 Twitter Script is in BETA, it works, however you'll prolly get rate limited from mass deleting of favorites.. (15 min at a time)

I'll leave the tweaking to you:
https://dev.twitter.com/rest/public/rate-limits

You'll need to "Create New App" and copy your Consumer Key (API Key), Consumer Secret (API Secret), Access Token, and Access Token Secret. Then paste them into the script in the appropriate variables. 

Then set permissions to "Read, Write and Access direct messages" in order to use Hermes in its entirety. https://apps.twitter.com/

Support: irc.freenode.net #archseptem
please report all bugs and troubleshooting information here.

"The Bird of Hermes is my name, Eating my Wings to make me tame." --Ripley Scroll
